verbs.description: [ARG0: cubs players] [V: wanted] chili davis fired the chicago cubs on thursday made the unsurprising decision to fire hitting coach chili davis the cubs’ offense tanked in the second half of the season and the approach davis was preaching ran counter to what the front office wanted to see on top of that the score in chicago dan bernstein reports that the feedback about davis from the players was negative players reportedly felt their swings or approaches had been negatively altered chili davis daniel j bernstein chicago dan bernstein cubs chicago cubs kris bryant
